name: nfe-infrastructure
description: AWS CDK Infrastructure for NFe System

scripts.deploy:dev: npm run build && cdk deploy NFeInfrastructureStack-dev --profile default
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build && cdk deploy NFeInfrastructureStack-prod --profile production
scripts.diff:dev: npm run build && cdk diff NFeInfrastructureStack-dev --profile default
scripts.diff:prod: npm run build && cdk diff NFeInfrastructureStack-prod --profile production

author: Lucas Antunes Ferreira
